Package lib.homies.framework.spigot.menu

Class SpigotMenuManager

java.lang.Object
lib.homies.framework.spigot.menu.SpigotMenuManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
MenuManager, org.bukkit.event.Listener
public class SpigotMenuManager extends Object implements MenuManager, org.bukkit.event.Listener
Spigot-specific implementation of the MenuManager interface. This class handles the creation, opening, closing, and interaction logic for inventory-based menus on a Bukkit/Spigot server. It also manages menu animations and event handling.

  • Method Details

    • openMenu

      public void openMenu(HomiesPlayer homiesPlayer, HomiesMenu menu)
      Opens a specific menu for a given player. Handles menu animations (pop-in) and initial item population.
      Specified by:
      openMenu in interface MenuManager
      Parameters:
      homiesPlayer - The HomiesPlayer for whom to open the menu.
      menu - The HomiesMenu instance to open.

    • closeMenu

      public void closeMenu(HomiesPlayer homiesPlayer)
      Closes the currently open menu for a given player. Handles menu animations (pop-out) if configured.
      Specified by:
      closeMenu in interface MenuManager
      Parameters:
      homiesPlayer - The HomiesPlayer for whom to close the menu.

    • registerMenu

      public void registerMenu(String id, HomiesMenu menu)
      Registers a menu with a unique ID, allowing it to be retrieved later.
      Specified by:
      registerMenu in interface MenuManager
      Parameters:
      id - A unique string identifier for the menu.
      menu - The HomiesMenu instance to register.

    • getMenu

      public HomiesMenu getMenu(String id)
      Retrieves a registered menu by its unique ID.
      Specified by:
      getMenu in interface MenuManager
      Parameters:
      id - The unique string identifier of the menu.
      Returns:
      The HomiesMenu instance if found, otherwise null.

    • onInventoryClick

      public void onInventoryClick(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event)
      Handles Bukkit's InventoryClickEvent. Delegates the click to the currently open HomiesMenu and its HomiesMenuItem.
      Parameters:
      event - The Bukkit InventoryClickEvent.

    • onInventoryClose

      public void onInventoryClose(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryCloseEvent event)
      Handles Bukkit's InventoryCloseEvent. Notifies the HomiesMenu that it has been closed for the player.
      Parameters:
      event - The Bukkit InventoryCloseEvent.

    • onMenuReload

      public void onMenuReload(MenuReloadEvent event)
      Handles the MenuReloadEvent to refresh all currently open menus. This method is subscribed to the custom event bus.
      Parameters:
      event - The MenuReloadEvent.
